title: How and when to build multi-agent systems
content: Late last week two great blog posts were released with seemingly opposite titles. “Don’t Build Multi-Agents” by the Cognition team, and “How we built our multi-agent research system” by the Anthropic team.Despite their opposing titles, I would argue they actually have a lot
author: Harrison Chase
